Text.Value: I tried... to kill... her... but she... killed me... first...
Leave.
*The corpse remains silent. It does not know.*

EditorData.logicalname: DOESN'T KNOW ANSWER - DELETE IF NOT NEEDED

Text.Value: Orin...
I... wanted... to be... Bhaal's... Chosen...
Why did you try to kill your own daughter?
So... did... I...
Bled... me... from... a... hundred... wounds...
No... she... worshipped... him... loved... him...
Who is Sarevok?
Baldur's... Gate... Brampton... district...
Who killed you?
Mother... of... Orin...
I... failed...
My... father... child... of Bhaal... executor... of... his... will...
Where are you from?
And laughed... as I... died...
I... was... close... my hand... around... her throat...
Why were you put on display like this?
She... hid... a... blade... beneath... her pillow...
Helena... Anchev... daughter... of... Sarevok...
What happened to you?
*The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*
*The corpse regards you lifelessly.*

EditorData.InternalNodeContext: Note to cinematics: for this SWD, the corpse is inside an upright chamber (like an iron maiden) and we don't need to see it fall out of the container, so keep her SWD as she is.

Text.Value: Did Orin know that Sarevok ordered you to kill her?
How did Orin kill you?
Who are you?
Orin... my... daughter...
Cut off... my hand... while... I... still... breathed...
Does Orin know that Sarevok ordered you to kill her?
Sarevok... told me... she... must be... my... offering...
*The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*
Why did you try to kill your own daughter?
*The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

Synopsis:
Sarevok is both Orin's grandfather and father. Orin's mother was his favourite, and he wanted her to become the next Chosen. Ordering her to sacrifice Orin to Bhaal. Orin defended herself and instead killed her own mother and in turn became the Chosen.

Sarevok has presevered Orin's mothers body in a secret chamber in the Bhaal Temple, where players can discover it.
